author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tvanepps> <@291925846556540928> what's the motivation for including "graffiti" - are there imagined uses from validators? will it add to long term storage costs or be negligible

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tvanepps> just curious

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <protolambda> For testnets it will be usef

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <protolambda> ul to track metadata

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <protolambda> Eh, switching back to discord site, mobile gitter app is awful

author: protolambda
content:
Meta data such as version, vendor, start time, etc. is nice to readily have available in testnet data.
For mainnets, it could just be something like the a way to advertise yourself (similar to Bitcoin miners do), do some kind of signaling, or include hashes (or roots of) data of 2nd layer things. Really just some space to freely play around with new ideas
